full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Title / Titre**: Metal Sheet - W8485-237328/A

**Reference Number / Numéro de référence**: PW-22-01015118

**Solicitation Number / Numéro de sollicitation**: W8485-237328/A

**Publication Date / Date de publication**: November 29, 2022
**Tender Closing Date / Date limite du processus de soumission**: December 13, 2022, 00:00:00

**Description / Description**:

The Department of National Defence intends to procure a metal sheet with the following specifications:

- **Item 1**: Metal Sheet (GSIN: 9515, NSN: 9515-21-819-8745)
- **Part No.**: AMS5532, **NCAGE**: 81343
- **Quantity**: 3 units
- **Unit of Issue**: Each
- **Delivery Location**: 25 CFSD Montreal, Free Carrier
- **Preferable Procurement**: Canadian goods and/or services

**Important Notes:**

- Bidders proposing Equivalent or Substitute Products must indicate the Part Number and NCAGE offered.
- Documents can be submitted in either official language of Canada.
- The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on this procurement.

**Contact Information / Informations de contact**:

- **Name / Nom**: Duncan, Ryan
- **Email / Courriel**: ryan.duncan@forces.gc.ca
- **Phone / Téléphone**: Not provided
- **Fax / Télécopie**: Not provided

**Procurement Details / Détails du processus de soumission**:

- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
- **Selection Criteria**: Not specified
- **Trade Agreements**: Not applicable
- **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
- **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)

Note that some information originally provided in multiple languages was only written in one. I've kept it to both to ensure accuracy. Please ensure that all information is up-to-date, accurate and relevant to the current situation. Please clarify any questions you might have concerning any information or provide updates if needed. Please provide feedback on formatting suggestions if needed. 

**Stephen Francisco** 
Technical Writer Specializing in Government and Technical Content 
[@andyleoc](https://andyleoc.github.io/)
